fields.inlineHelpText: Select a bundle service appointment field. The value is pulled from the bundle member service appointment.
fields.label: Bundle’s Target Field
fields.name: BundleFieldName

fields.inlineHelpText: The source field comes from the bundle member service appointment. If you select the aggregation action Sum Based on Bundle Fields or Subtract Based on Bundle Fields, the source field comes from the bundle service appointment.
fields.label: Source Field
fields.name: BundleMemberFieldName

fields.inlineHelpText: The additional source field comes from the bundle member service appointment. If you select the aggregation action Sum Based on Bundle Fields or Subtract Based on Bundle Fields, the additional source field comes from the bundle service appointment.
fields.label: Additional Source Field
fields.name: BundleMemberAddiFieldName

fields.label: Aggregate only when the bundle is created
fields.name: ShouldUpdateOnCreationOnly

fields.inlineHelpText: Enter the recordset filter criteria used to aggregate the bundle members. You can aggregate only service appointments that meet this criteria.
fields.label: Recordset Filter Criteria ID
fields.name: FilterCriteriaId

fields.inlineHelpText: Applies only if the Set Downscaled Duration action is set. Select the downscaling sorting direction of the bundle member service appointments, according to their duration.
fields.label: Downscale Sorting Direction
fields.name: DownscaleSortDirection

fields.inlineHelpText: Set the order to trigger the aggregation. For example, enter 1 to trigger this policy first.
fields.label: Aggregation Order
fields.name: AggregationOrder

fields.inlineHelpText: Applies only if date aggregations require a constant date value.
fields.label: Constant Date Value
fields.name: DateValue

fields.inlineHelpText: Applies to downscaling aggregations only. Enter the maximum bundle duration, in minutes, calculated from the sum of bundle members after downscaling.
fields.label: Maximum Bundle Duration
fields.name: MaxBundleDuration

fields.inlineHelpText: Valid only if Sum Based on Bundle Members is selected for the Aggregation Action.
fields.label: Allow the same value to appear more than once
fields.name: DoesAllowDuplicateStrings

fields.inlineHelpText: Select the bundle service appointment’s field type. The value is filled via the aggregation.
fields.label: Aggregation Field Type
fields.name: AggregationFieldType

fields.inlineHelpText: Select an action that can be used with the Bundle Field Name. For help, check the documentation.
fields.label: Aggregation Action
fields.name: AggregationAction

picklistValues.label: Count Bundle Members in Filter Criteria
picklistValues.value: Count Bundle Members in Filter Criteria

picklistValues.label: Has at least one Bundle Member in Filter Criteria
picklistValues.value: Has at least one Bundle Member in Filter Criteria
